a-demonstration-of-how-hugo-and-rosey-wo.original: A demonstration of how Hugo and Rosey work in CloudCannon. This site has extra setup so that we can enter translations via the CloudCannon GUI. Additional languages can be set in the environment variables in CloudCannon’s build configuration.
a-demonstration-of-how-hugo-and-rosey-wo.value: Una demostración de cómo trabajan Hugo y Rosey en CloudCannon. Este sitio tiene una configuración adicional para que podamos ingresar traducciones a través de la GUI de CloudCannon. Se pueden configurar idiomas adicionales en las variables de entorno en la configuración de compilación de CloudCannon.

keep-what-you-need-delete-the-rest.original: Keep what you need. Delete the rest.
keep-what-you-need-delete-the-rest.value: Conserva lo que necesitas. Elimina el resto.

make-your-own-copy-of-this-repository-re.original: Make your own copy of this repository. Reference it or use it as a template to get up and running with translation workflows in CloudCannon using Rosey.
make-your-own-copy-of-this-repository-re.value: Make your own copy of this repository. Reference it or use it as a template to get up and running with translation workflows in CloudCannon using Rosey.
